quote_first: They had a listing for Ozgard, Ramsey G., in the city. It was
quote_last: in Colorado, but the hour might make the call seem more urgent and therefore more credible.
quote_raw: They had a listing for Ozgard, Ramsey G., in the city. It was 10:54 in Colorado, but the hour might make the call seem more urgent and therefore more credible.
title: Velocity
author: Dean Koontz
